name: Eye of Etlich
flavorText: Originally pulled from a frozen corpse on the slopes of Mount Arreat, the eye seethes with the magic of a dozen sorcerers.
flavorTextHtml: Originally pulled from a frozen corpse on the slopes of Mount Arreat, the eye seethes with the magic of a dozen sorcerers.
